item.title: Shop with tokens, but can buy for nothing
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

so recently i made a shop with tokens

if (c.myShopId == 81) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Boss Tokens."); return; } if (c.myShopId == 80) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " Boss Tokens."); return; }
that and this

[code] if (c.myShopId == 80) {
if (c.bossTokens >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
c.bossTokens -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough Boss Tokens to buy this item.”);
}

		}
		if (c.myShopId == 81) {
			if (c.bossTokens >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
				if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
					c.bossTokens -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
					c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
					c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Boss Tokens to buy this item.");			
			}

		}[/code]

but it doesnt cost you anything? what am i doing wrong?

Read full topic
